mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Guym, William
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Guym, William Patient Age: 18. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of right arm. Conical bullet entered inner and outward aspect of arms one and a half inches from the flex use of elbow point passing a little obliquely backwards to exit three inches above external condyle. Location Wounded: Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Guym, William
